Test case

func main(){

    s, err := url.QueryUnescape("%25%u0414%u0430%u0432%u044B%u0434%u043E%u0432%25%u0418%u0432%u0430%u043D%25")

    if err != nil {

        fmt.Println("Error - ", err)

    }

    fmt.Println(s)

}
